title: Full of Energy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Dia-san! Look here-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Rin-san, please be carefu-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>CONSECUTIVE REVERSE AERIAL SPIN---! NYAA----!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kyaaaah!! R-, Rin-saan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nya?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Umm, are you not dizzy? Are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>This much is perfectly fine♪ Dia-san, want to do it together? Spinning around is so much fun<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>A high bar…. I haven’t done one since grade school, I wonder if I can still do it now….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>If you’ve done it in the past, your body will surely remember nya! Look at this! CONSECUTIVE FORWARD AERIAL SPIN---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kyaaaah!! The consecutive part! The consecutive part is dangerous-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
